name: Dairy-Free Spinach and Artichoke Dip
author: Personal20
summary: This dairy-free dip is rich with flavor and creamy without any dairy to be seen. This recipe is sure to be a crowd favorite, is paleo-friendly, and makes for a great party appetizer. Serve with your choice of chips, cucumber slices, or other vegetables.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh spinach leaves, stemmed and roughly chopped
2 (14 ounce) cans artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
⅓ cup finely chopped red onion
½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
directions: Place cashews in a bowl and cover with water
Allow to soak 8 hours to overnight
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Drain cashews and place in a food processor
Add mayonnaise, coconut milk, and water
Transfer the mixture to a large bowl and add spinach, artichoke hearts, onion, garlic, salt, pepper, and paprika
Mix thoroughly and transfer to an oven-safe baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until hot and bubbly, about 20 minutes
